entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Partly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023
